content.webTitle: Liverpool miss chance to go top

fields.headline: Liverpool miss chance to go top
fields.bodyText: FA Barclaycard Premiership Charlton Athletic 3 - 2 Ipswich Chelsea 2 - 4 Southampton Liverpool 1 - 1 Bolton Wanderers Middlesbrough 1 - 0 Everton Sunderland 1 - 1 Aston Villa Tottenham Hotspur 1 - 0 Blackburn Rovers Leicester City P - P Arsenal Leeds v West Ham (Evening kick-off)
